subject: Package
description_text:
To whom it may concern,

I had ordered some Pedals through Simsonn, but when they were ordered, I did not have an account. I entered in this email, but never got a order confirmation. I don't know if it was a typo or a problem on your side. But I do have the bank statements saying it went through, I ordered it July 14th and would just like to track the package! Is there any way I can do that?

Thanks
Michael Leech

Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Leech, Sean,  Please provide the payment date and amount, and I’ll help you locate the corresponding order.

The payment took place on July 14th, posted by my bank July 15th, with an exact amount of 251.90.

Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Leech, Sean,    You didn't fill out an email address, I've added this current one for you, but can't resend you a shipping notification, you can track it through this link.  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=882782534426
